snippet: “Seesaw marriage” means taking turns. But waiting for your time in either the dominant parent or the career-focused parent role can feel more like a tug of war.
abstract: “Seesaw marriage” means taking turns. But waiting for your time in either the dominant parent or the career-focused parent role can feel more like a tug of war.

headline.main: The Ups and Downs of 'Seesaw Marriages'
